text: jab tum ghanimate lene jaane lagoge, to jhat se ye piche chohde hoye log kehne lagenge ke hamein bhi apne saath chalne ki ijaazath di jiye, wo chaahte hai ke Allah taâ€™ala ke kalaam ko badal de, aap keh dijiye! ke Allah pehle hee farma chuka hai ke tum hargiz hamaare saath nahi chaloge, wo us ka jawaab denge (nahi nahi) balke tum hum se hasadh karte ho (asal baath ye hai) ke wo log bahuth hee kam samajhte hai
